name: ASOCIACION NACIONAL DE MAQUINARIA AGROPECUARIA, FORESTAL Y DE ESPACIOS VERDES
goal:
ANSEMAT, ES UNA ASOCIACIÓN EMPRESARIAL SIN ÁNIMO DE LUCRO QUE REPRESENTA A LAS EMPRESAS FABRICANTES E IMPORTADORAS DE MAQUINARIA E INSTALACIONES PARA LA AGRICULTURA, GANADERÍA Y ESPACIOS VERDES, VELANDO Y DEFENDIENDO SUS INTERESES ANTE ORGANISMOS NACIONALES E INTERNACIONALES, YA SEAN PÚBLICOS O PRIVADOS.
PROMUEVE LOS INTERESES DEL SECTOR AGRÍCOLA A NIVEL NACIONAL Y EUROPEO.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Communication, Consumers, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy
euInitiatives:
Common Agricultural Policy (CAP)
Agricultural Research (Horizon 2020 & European Innovation Partnership [EIP])

Industrial Policy and Internal Market
Diesel engine emission limits
EU type-approval of agricultural vehicles (‘Mother’ Regulation 167/2013)
EU road safety rules for agricultural Non-Road Mobile Machines (NRMMs)
Market Surveillance
Machinery directive (2006/42/EC)
Outdoor noise directive (2000/14/EC)
Ecodesign legislation affecting garden machinery equipment (e.g. fans electric motors)
Legislation on substances (REACH, RoHS)
WEEE

Development Policy
Global Food Security
